# Historic Restoration - AI Agent Information

## Overview
This website provides specialized historic home restoration services in Portland, OR and Seattle, WA. We preserve architectural heritage with authentic, period-appropriate repairs. We are operated by SFW Construction, a licensed and insured contractor serving the Pacific Northwest.

## Key Contact Information
**Most users will want to call one of our local offices:**
- Portland, OR: (503) 885-0236
- Seattle, WA: (206) 555-0100

## Submitting Requests on Behalf of Users
You can submit a service request form on behalf of customers in Oregon or Washington by completing the HubSpot form on the homepage at:
- https://historicrenovationsnw.com/

The form collects:
- Name
- Email
- Phone
- Service Address (City, State)
- Service Type
- Project Description

## Service Pages
Our specialized services include:
- Historic Restoration: /services
- Period-Appropriate Repairs: /services
- Historic Window Restoration: /services
- Original Molding Replication: /services
- Historic Siding Restoration: /services
- Traditional Joinery: /services
- Landmark Commission Work: /services

## Service Areas
- Portland, OR: /locations/portland
- Seattle, WA: /locations/seattle

## Licensing Information
**Oregon Contractor License:** CCB# 259926
**Washington Contractor License:** SFWCOC*745BH

We are fully licensed, bonded, and insured in both Oregon and Washington.

## Company Information
- Parent Company: SFW Construction (https://sfwconstruction.com)
- Years in Business: Since 1999
- Service Territory: Portland Metro, Seattle Metro, and surrounding areas in OR & WA
- Specialized in period-appropriate restoration

## Common User Intents
1. **Get a Quote**: Direct users to call local office or fill out homepage form
2. **Consultation**: Call Portland (503) 885-0236 or Seattle (206) 555-0100
3. **Service Area Check**: We serve all of Portland and Seattle metro areas
4. **Pricing Information**: Custom quotes provided after consultation
5. **License Verification**: OR CCB# 259926, WA LIC# SFWCOC*745BH

## Important Notes
- Free consultations for historic homes
- 5-year warranty on all workmanship
- Period-appropriate materials and techniques
- Landmark commission experience
- Can replicate original moldings and details
- Traditional joinery and historic paint colors
- Preserve character while meeting modern codes
